column6: THREE PART 2 In this issue: the return of Galactus, a trip to Nu-World, the Old Kings of Atlantis and Namor, the all-new Yancy Street Gang, and the day the Thing becomes human again.
column8: | penciller:Alan Davis | penciller:Steve Epting | inker:Mark Farmer | writer:Jonathan Hickman | colorist:Paul Mounts | colorist:Javier Rodriguez
